Name: Gin Tonica
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Copa glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist, lime wedge & 3 cardamom pods.
POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass.
Review: Something of a Spanish phenomenon, where the G&T (which in England has been traditionally served in a tall slim Collins glass) tends to be served in a huge goldfish bowl of a glass – big enough to house garnishes ranging from cardamom pods and juniper berries to fruit peels and slices of ginger.
Nutrition: One serving of Gin Tonica contains 191 calories
